languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}Душат нас{/d}, сволочи. Подкреплений уже целый оборот не было, боезапас кончается, каждый второй ранен. Не знаю, как там на улицах, а нас отсюда с часу на час вышибут".

"They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}Душат нас{/d}, сволочи. Подкреплений уже целый оборот не было, боезапас кончается, каждый второй ранен. Не знаю, как там на улицах, а нас отсюда с часу на час вышибут".

traits.locale_text: "They're crushing us, the scumbags. It's been a whole day since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

"They're crushing us, the scumbags. It's been a whole day since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

"They're crushing us, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

"They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

languages.text: "Sie {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}vernichten uns{/d}, diese Arschlöcher. Es ist schon ewig her, dass die letzten Verstärkungstruppen kamen, uns geht die Munition aus, jeder zweite Kämpfer ist verwundet. Ich weiß nicht, wie schlimm es auf den Straßen ist, aber hier werden sie uns jede Minute vertreiben."
languages.original_text: "They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

traits.locale_text: "Sie vernichten uns, diese Arschlöcher. Es ist schon ewig her, dass die letzten Verstärkungstruppen kamen, uns geht die Munition aus, jeder zweite Kämpfer ist verwundet. Ich weiß nicht, wie schlimm es auf den Straßen ist, aber hier werden sie uns jede Minute vertreiben."

languages.text: « Ils {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}nous défoncent{/d}, ces fumiers... Ça fait un moment que les derniers renforts sont arrivés et on commence à manquer de munitions... Sans compter qu'une bonne moitié de nos gars sont blessés. Je ne sais pas où ça en est dans les rues, mais ils devraient bientôt nous dégager d'ici. »
languages.original_text: "They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

traits.locale_text: « Ils nous défoncent, ces fumiers... Ça fait un moment que les derniers renforts sont arrivés et on commence à manquer de munitions... Sans compter qu'une bonne moitié de nos gars sont blessés. Je ne sais pas où ça en est dans les rues, mais ils devraient bientôt nous dégager d'ici. »

languages.text: “他们一直在{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}冲击我们的防线{/d}，那些该死的人渣。上次增援已经是一个周期前的事情了，我们的弹药快打光了，其他战士也都受伤了。我不知道街上的情况有多糟，但我确信，他们随时都可能把我们赶出这里。”
languages.original_text: "They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

traits.locale_text: “他们一直在冲击我们的防线，那些该死的人渣。上次增援已经是一个周期前的事情了，我们的弹药快打光了，其他战士也都受伤了。我不知道街上的情况有多糟，但我确信，他们随时都可能把我们赶出这里。”

languages.text: 「連中は私達を{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}押し潰す{/d}気です。最後の援軍が来てから丸1ターンが経過して、弾薬は底をつき、他の戦闘員は全員負傷しています。街中がどれほどの惨状かは分かりませんが、すぐにでもここから追い出されてしまうでしょう」
languages.original_text: "They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

traits.locale_text: 「連中は私達を押し潰す気です。最後の援軍が来てから丸1ターンが経過して、弾薬は底をつき、他の戦闘員は全員負傷しています。街中がどれほどの惨状かは分かりませんが、すぐにでもここから追い出されてしまうでしょう」

languages.text: «Nos están {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}aplastando{/d}, los cabrones. Ha pasado un turno entero desde que llegaron los últimos refuerzos, nos estamos quedando sin munición, todos los demás guerreros están heridos. No sé lo mal que están las calles, pero nos echarán de aquí en cualquier momento».
languages.original_text: "They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

traits.locale_text: «Nos están aplastando, los cabrones. Ha pasado un turno entero desde que llegaron los últimos refuerzos, nos estamos quedando sin munición, todos los demás guerreros están heridos. No sé lo mal que están las calles, pero nos echarán de aquí en cualquier momento».

languages.text: "İtler {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}üstümüze üstümüze geliyor{/d}. Son takviye geleli tam bir devir oldu. Cephanemiz azalıyor, eli silah tutan iki kişiden biri yaralı. Sokaklarda durum ne kadar kötü bilmiyorum ama bizi her an buradan sürebilirler."
languages.original_text: "They're {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}crushing us{/d}, the scumbags. It's been a whole turn since the last reinforcements came in, we're running low on ammo, every other fighter is wounded. I don't know how bad it is in the streets, but they'll drive us out of here any minute."

traits.locale_text: "İtler üstümüze üstümüze geliyor. Son takviye geleli tam bir devir oldu. Cephanemiz azalıyor, eli silah tutan iki kişiden biri yaralı. Sokaklarda durum ne kadar kötü bilmiyorum ama bizi her an buradan sürebilirler."
